title: mannittu marandiDuvAi
sahitya:
mannittu marandiDuvAi en pizhaigaLai mArap-purindiDuvAi shivanE


anupallavi

  annaiyE appanE unnai sharaN pughundEn aDittadu pOdum ini eDuttenai AluvAi


caraNam    nAn oru muraTTup-piLLai ennAl unakku nALum peria saLLai
mAnamillAda maDaiyan un vArttaiyai madikkAdu keTTa naDaiyan
hInanEnum unadu jnAna varamaLittAl enadu kuraigaLellAm iravimun paniyAmE
